name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Godfather Mafia Chronicles Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Step into the world of The Godfather with this mafia-inspired live Tab featuring sleek design, dynamic visuals and quick shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dynamic Live Wallpaper: Iconic Godfather visuals with a cinematic mafia vibe.
Minimalist Design: Clean interface for seamless browsing and immersive experience.
Clock and Date: Stay on schedule with a prominently displayed time and date.
Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate quickly to your favorite websites.
Google Search Bar: Fast and reliable search functionality.
More Extension: Add extra features to enrich your browsing experience.
It searches using the search engine selected by the user.
